name: Porter Bradley
text: I visit this spot a lot since I work nearby. I have to say their service is always good and they keep the spot well kept at all times. Pricing is convenient and they serve big portions.

name: Brandon Dix
text: My favorite pizza place since I was a child. Ive been eating at Gatti's for 35 years or so. The crust is perfect, the sauce is amazing. The flavor has been consistent all these years. I love it. Highly recommend.

name: Richard Keating
text: Online ordering is cryptic.  Called to place an order 1/2 Deluxe and 1/2 ham/pineapple.  The response was sorry you have to buy a whole deluxe and then we remove all the deluxe topping from half and charge you for the additional ham and cheese.  I'm sorry that is just stupid and you lost my business.

name: Dani Gomez
text: So I came here for dinner 3.21.2017, I walk in to a buffet establishment I expect to see a buffet, correct? Apparently not. I am disappointed for a few reasons. The team (of 2 people) have one pizza (cold) out as well as a few cinnamon ‚Ä¶More

name: Gamer kid
text: This place trash . The soda machine never works . They are never ready for lunch time people.  Let's not even talk about the TVs in the place they never work . The people that work there are on there phone most of the time.  I have gave this place multiple chances . I give it a half a star!!!!

name: Tyler Wallace
text:
Walked in because I wanted a to go pizza.  Time:8:51 on Friday.

One employee from way back behind the counter looked at me and without moving ‚Ä¶More

text: We‚Äôve been Gatti‚Äôs customers for over 40 years and each year the quality gets worse each time we order, now customer service and promised times have exceeded what is normal. Tonight we ordered pizza at 8:56 PM and I was given a 30 minute ‚Ä¶More

name: Samuel Cobb
text: The only thing not garnering a 1 star rating for this place is the general cleanliness of this store. The pizza was old, dry, and relatively flavorless. The fountain drink machine spewed the drink which made it spray all over my hand. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Marco La Porta
text: Subpar pizza at best but the salad bar was surprisingly fresh.

name: Andrea Leblanc
text: The transition from lunch time into dinner is the worst time to visit the buffet. Everything was stale and cold. We had pizza delivered from this location before. Our pizza was made completely wrong, we paid extra for icing for the cinnamon sticks and didnt receive it. The ranch is to die for though.

name: Rebecca Spencer
text: Paid for extra toppings and literally got 2 pepperonis on each slice and a sprinkle of ground beef. What a disappointment

name: Michael Thomas
text: Delicious but one pizza was not ready that I ordered by phone.

name: Misty Chaffin
text: Good pizza and sauce.  Clean and friendly.  I'll be back.

name: Lucina Martinez
text: One star is really too good for my experience. Walked in not a lot of variety of pizza and what is on there doesn‚Äôt look very fresh. The tables and over all doesn‚Äôt look too clean. Salad bar ok that‚Äôs why I gave it one star ‚≠êÔ∏è!!!  Games for ‚Ä¶More

name: Annie Poindexter
text: Went there after a long day driving. Was told one amount for our total and was charged extra when i looked at my bank statement. Pizzas in the buffet were old and gross. The spaghetti area was so crusty and disgusting. Worst experience ever ‚Ä¶More

name: Liz Beth
text: Service was terrific.  They even asked us what kind of pizzas we would like on the buffet, and they made the pizzas as requested.  Thoughtful.  Unfortunately, the pizza was a little greasy.  We enjoyed watching the NBA playoffs there.

name: Donna Trethewey
text: Incredibly disappointed in Gatti's.  We were passing through from Phoenix and were looking for good pizza to have delivered to our hotel.  They delivered but our choices were Gatti's, Pizza Hut or Dominoes.  They delivered the order ‚Ä¶More

name: thelastdropoflime s
text: Food is decent for price but felt very unclean.  Found a dead fly in the spaghetti and a hair in my pizza.  I watched the cooks touching the pizza with their bare hands.  With no gloves. Sad to see this place go down hill.

name: Stephen McGee
text: Called, was put on hold for over 10 minutes.  Hung up, called back.  Got a busy signal after a few rings. ‚Ä¶More

name: Josh Galbraith
text: This place is great because of one man Brenan he was very professional and consistent on getting my order correct and he made me feel like I wasn‚Äôt just a customer but like I was family I‚Äôd give 10 stars if I could because of him üôåüèª

name: Alex Brown
text: Place is incredibly understaffed. I like gattis pizza but the poor dude working the place and his coworker were about 50 to 60 pizzas deep when I ordered. When we came back an hour and 45 minutes later to pick up the pizza, his coworker had ‚Ä¶More

name: Ashley Martinez
text: The worst place to order any kind of pizza they had me on hold for 20 min than after the worker named john answered he was really confused and very rude so i waited another 30 min just to order 2 simple large pizzas. Time to eat at pizza hut!

name: Danny DeLaRosa
text:
staff was very helpful  and attentive. Pizza selection on the buffet was great and salad bar was full.
Will definitely return here.

name: Claudia Trevino
text: Manager on Saturday night, 5/26/18 didn‚Äôt check my two pizza boxes and gave me the wrong order. Had to drive all the way back. He didn‚Äôt call me to tell me he gave me the wrong order. He was very rude about the whole situation. I called the store he answered and asked if I was done talking and hung up on me. Do NOT go to this location.

name: Alex Banos
text: Love the pizza and the home town feel. However they never answer their damn phones so I can place an order. What good is a pizza place if they don't answer there phones? I've called on 3 separate occasions in the last 2 weeks and every ‚Ä¶More

name: cody robertson
text: Awful. Left when we saw what we thought was the cook walked out and started bussing tables. Not a big deal but never once did the man wash his hands and no there were no gloves on his hands. 0 stars if possible. Wont be back there again.

name: Victoria Salinas
text: Horrible experience with a delivery order. Received an email confirmation with the correct address and phone number. 2 hours later and still no pizza, no phone call, no email, nothing. We call the store to check on our order and the manager ‚Ä¶More

name: Nayeli Victoria
text: Not a lot if options and a bit expensive

name: Sandra S Herrera
text: Ordered my pizza 8:15 pm it‚Äôs 9:45 and still no pizza! Called and was told pizza was on its way and it would be arriving soon! 30 minutes later still no pizza! Place closed at 10 pm and pizza never arrived!!! Tried calling numerous times no ‚Ä¶More

name: Kim San Miguel
text: I have been coming to this Gattis since I was a child, and have never had problems until recently. Maybe under new management, but it's totally gone down hill. Recently decided to give them another try and ordered for pickup, and arrived at ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Orozco
text: Under staffed location fresh pizza needed quicker on buffet waited for fresh pizza restaurant needs cleaning 2 person staff were doing their best to pricey for waiting on fresh pizza and empty salad bar .  A good restaurant Mgr might help this location.

name: Juliana Garcia
text: I placed an order @ 8:21 pm online & said the wait would be ‚Äú120min‚Äù so I waited & waited & waited... I called them 5 times and no answer, that‚Äôs how you guys run business? now it‚Äôs 11:15 which means y‚Äôall are closed and no pizza arrived at ‚Ä¶More

name: Tina Mayer
text: This place continues to disappoint .  They only clear tables  when all the tables are taken up  ... oh I guess more people need to find a clean table to sit at.  I counted 10  out of 16 tables loaded  used with dishes .  And only 5 people were dinning  at noon .  The food looked old  and cold    just really subpar on many levels .

name: Kiryssa Bostick
text: Just issue after issue with this location. Waited almost 2 hours for a delivery order. Called to see what was going on and they said that no drivers came into work! So they were doing carry out only!! But didn‚Äôt bother to call us!!?!?!! We ‚Ä¶More

name: Roy Lee Buchanan
text: Cold pizza... the staff hid the pie we ordered under the counter....Apparently when Mr. Gatti found God... he lost his recipes for good food.

name: Jamie Rose
text: They sold us cinnasticks based on the representation that they had icing, Then the delivery  guy didn‚Äôt bring icing.  Lame.

name: John Pinney
text: Very very gross pizza. Cardboard with some ketchup and flavorless toppings

name: Gary Simmank
text: Gave me the wrong pizza

name: Dan Fodor
text: Google says their open till 10pm. The sign next to their frontdoor says their open till 10pm. But when you walk in on Thursday at 8:40pm, they tell you they are closing in 20 minutes. Told the manager that google said 10pm., he didnt care. Way to run a business

name: Stafford Ullrich
text: Friendly staff. Great pizza... always pizza on the buffet line no matter what the time

name: Alex R
text: Slow people who dont know what their doing,how hard is it till follow a system

name: Louie Felipe Murphy
text: Better than the national chains

name: Dex
text: Cardboard pizza... They do have decent combinations but the overall flavor is bland. Salad bar is pretty good though. Games are pretty crap. Half are broken and malfunction. Prizes cost too many tickets.

name: Daniel Calarco
text: Good cheap pizza buffet, nice employee's too.

name: Unhappy Goose
text: Literally the worst online order format where it barely tells you when you‚Äôve done something wrong, about every rating supporting them is a company pet or bots

name: Jimmy Texas
text: Gattis is my favorite inexpensive pizza. They will make you whatever you want on the buffet.

name: Uriel Gerardo
text: I love gatti's pizza but this place feels really off. It's never busy when I come through so it's really quick to come in but the food looks and taste like it's been sitting out to long under the lap. The service is alright, just feels like they don't really want to be there. General clean seeing how there's never anyone there.

name: Felipe Borrero
text:
Came for lunch, no pizza ready for buffet,  not one slice!!!
Not one cube of ice in ice machine.
Also no one at counter for about 3 min with 8 people in line waiting. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jonathan Hall
text: The food is hit or miss depending on staff. Friendliness is not expected as the staff seems minimal and overworked.

name: Robin Stroud
text: Supposedly a buffet location! Sign shows 10:30am! Walk in at 11:20am NO Pizza on the buffet! From other reviews this location needs to be shut down! For pizza buffet go to CiCi‚Äôs they‚Äôll have pizza ready! Such BS Gattis!!

name: Tina Wall

It's never pizza on the line...  First and Last time I visit this place. Never came back again.
NEVER

text: We went about 1pm and they only had a couple half pizzas.

name: Stephen Baxter
text: Messy salad and pizza bar.  No AC. Last time in.

name: Allison Preslar
text: Everything you would want from a Gatti's. The buffet is always full and they are great at asking for requests.

name: The Texan
text: Below average for a Gattis pizza, especially during their lunch buffet. For the price, we received limited options and the place was sub-par in cleanliness.
